price: Hakika wachamngu watakuwa katika Mabustani na chemchem.
footnotes: Haya ni malipo ya wanao mfuata Shetani. Ama wale ambao Shetani kashindwa kuwapotoa, kwa kuwa wameweka kinga baina yake na nyoyo zao, hao watapata Mabustani yaliyo bora, na chemchem zinazo pita .

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
